content.raw:
Oh cool, a scripting interface would definitely be nice. 

I'm just wondering if it would make more sense for this to live outside of the ign-math C++ repository and debian package and be its own thing though. I imagine it could get a bit messy if we start to add interfaces to many languages. I'd be interested to learn about how other projects are handling this.
